Instrument.name: GAMMA-RAY AND NEUTRON DETECTOR
Instrument.description: GRaND is a nuclear spectrometer which measures the spectrum of planetary gamma rays and neutrons which originate from galactic cosmic ray interactions and the decay of radio elements within the regolith of the target body. This instrument uses a total of 21 sensors with a very wide field of view to measure the elemental composition of both Vesta and Ceres.
